style: section { font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif; } h1 { color: #2563eb; border-bottom: 2px solid #2563eb; padding-bottom: 0.3em; } h2 { color: #1e40af; margin-top: 1.5em; } code { background-color: #f3f4f6; padding: 0.2em 0.4em; border-radius: 3px; } table { border-collapse: collapse; width: 100%; margin: 1em 0; } th, td { border: 1px solid #e5e7eb; padding: 0.5em; text-align: left; } th { background-color: #f9fafb; font-weight: 600; }
